payload.title: MethodologyAdapter Implementation - Validation Engine
payload.description: Implement MethodologyAdapter class with getTransitionRule, validateSignature, validateCustomRules methods. Include basic hardcoded rules for standard GitGovernance workflow (draft → review → ready → active → done → archived) and custom rules engine foundation.
payload.notes: MethodologyAdapter implemented as oracle for BacklogAdapter workflow decisions. Basic transition rules for standard GitGovernance flow, signature validation with capability role checking, custom rules engine with assignment and sprint validation hooks. JSON config loading foundation prepared.
